title: 277. The Taboo Trifecta
description: The serial entrepreneur Miki Agrawal loves to talk about the bodily functions that make most people flinch. That's why she's building a business around the three P's: periods, pee, and poop.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: The serial entrepreneur Miki Agrawal loves to talk about the bodily functions that make most people flinch. That's why she's building a business around the three P's: periods, pee, and poop.
